scripts.clean: if [ -d build ]; then rm -rf build; fi
scripts.start: npm run clean; mkdir build; npm run watch & live-server --no-browser --wait=600 build
scripts.stylus: stylus -u ./node_modules/poststylus --with "[require('${PWD}/node_modules/autoprefixer')({ browsers: ['last 3 versions'] }), require('${PWD}/node_modules/css-mqpacker'), require('${PWD}/node_modules/postcss-flexbugs-fixes'), require('${PWD}/node_modules/postcss-import')()]" -I node_modules/sanitize.css -o build src/index.styl
scripts.watch: npm run watch:pug & npm run watch:styl
scripts.build:css: npm run stylus; cssnano build/index.css build/index.css
scripts.build:src: NODE_ENV=production npm run pug && npm run build:css
scripts.build: npm run clean; mkdir build; npm run build:src; npm run cp; npm run cname
